subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Wisconsin’s Michael Flowers made a long 3-pointer with two seconds to play, then tossed a loose ball high in the air to run out the clock and lift the Badgers to a 67-66 upset of the No. 9 Longhorns on Saturday.
snippet: Wisconsin’s Michael Flowers made a long 3-pointer with two seconds to play, then tossed a loose ball high in the air to run out the clock and lift the Badgers to a 67-66 upset of the No. 9 Longhorns on Saturday.
